root.name: Major League Baseball 2K12
root.description: OverviewMajor League Baseball 2K12 is a baseball game developed by Visual Concepts and published by 2K Sports for multiple platforms. SoundtrackMy Morning Jacket - "Holdin' On To Black Metal"The Cool Kids - "Boomin'"The Vaccines - "If You Wanna"Skrillex - "Scary Monsters and Nice Sprites"The Joy Formidable - "Austere"G-Side - "Put Me In The Game"Grouplove - "Colours"Explosions in the Sky - "Trembling Hands"Atmosphere - "Just For Show"Jeff The Brotherhood - "Shredder"Telekenesis - "Please Ask For Help"Pretty Lights - "Hot Like Dimes"Bass Drum of Death - "Get Found"
